item.title: Arch on Odroid-C1
item.description:
So, in order to install Archlinux on the Odroid-C1, make sure you have an existing Ubuntu-machine running. If you do not have, download the Ubuntu image on your Mac or Windows, then write an SD-card that you can use on the Odroid in order to have an Ubuntu-environment to set up the Archlinux onto the EMMC or another SD-card. Phew.

On your Mac OS X

wget http://de.eu.odroid.in/ubuntu_14.04lts/ubuntu-14.04.3lts-lubuntu-odroid-c1-20151020.img.xz
# Remember to verify the md5!
unxz ubuntu-14.04.3lts-lubuntu-odroid-c1-20151020.img.xz

# Check the ID for your SD card, replace # with ID number
df -h

sudo diskutil unmountDisk /dev/disk#
sudo dd bs=1m if=ubuntu-14.04.3lts-lubuntu-odroid-c1-20151020.img of=/dev/rdisk#

Now, place your SD card containing Lubuntu into your Odroid-C1, and boot it up.

On your Odroid-C1 running Lubuntu

Default user/pass is odroid/odroid

Follow the official guide on getting Archlinux. https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv7/amlogic/odroid-c1

Now, boot up the Archlinux EMMC on your Odroid-C1.

On your Odroid-C1 running Archlinux

Default user/pass is alarm/alarm, and root-password is root

alarm alarm
su #login with root
pacman -Syu
pacman -S iperf3
pacman -S git

item.title: birth of a blog
item.description:
Hello Internet.

For many years, I have wrestled with lack of focus and attention. Would I give myself a diagnosis, I would say I have ADHD. But I hate labels, and I believe we are all a little bit crazy, some more than others, but nobody is normal.

I needed an outlet, a place to put down what is inside of my head.

After several failed attempts at maintaining a Wordpress-site, or pure HTML sites, I gave up. My head was, and for the foreseeable future, would remain a total mess, clogged with thoughts and ideas.

This is one last, final attempt at making a single archive of the world as I see it. If I fail keeping this up, I recon I will never manage to do so.

Set up using hugo1, a static site generator, and hosted by github2, to ensure it will remain up even if/when I run out of money. Even when I die. Pretty nifty, huh?

I would love to get your thoughts on the matters at hand, and I ask you to send me an email if you have any input. If it is interesting and useful, I may add it to the posts where applicable.

Yes, the content here will be highly subjective. Yes, some of it may also be controversial. Yes, things may get crazy.

Welcome to The world according to Joakim.
